column2:
This minion's strength is equal to the number of fire icons in play.

This minion's health is equal to the number of fire icons on the board multiplied by 3.
Counters can't be removed from other durations (including when time passes).
Your first action each turn costs 1 extra resource of any type.
Whenever you would heal damage, you may remove that many counters from this duration instead.
When time passes, this deals 1 damage.

When time passes, if the last counter is removed from this duration, it deals 5 damage.

Whenever you would deal damage, you may remove that many counters from this duration instead.

This deals 1+X damage, where X is the number of fire icons in play. 

If there are no fire symbols in play, Surge.
